name: detectron2
description: Detectron2 is a platform for object detection, segmentation and other visual recognition tasks.
readme_summary: Detectron2 is a next-generation library from Facebook AI Research for object detection, segmentation, and other visual recognition tasks. It serves as a platform for computer vision research and production applications, offering state-of-the-art algorithms and capabilities such as panoptic segmentation and rotated bounding boxes.
key_features: Model export to TorchScript or Caffe2
primary_use_case: Object detection and segmentation research and production.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled cartographer meticulously tracing the outlines of various objects within a vibrant, bustling cityscape using a specialized digital pen. The pen emits glowing particles that form precise bounding boxes and segmentation masks around buildings, vehicles, and people. A holographic display shows the underlying code and algorithms that power the object detection process. The scene is set in a futuristic workshop with soft, diffused lighting. The composition is clean and focused with a blue and orange color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: PaddleOCR
description: Turn any PDF or image document into structured data for your AI. A powerful, lightweight OCR toolkit that bridges the gap between images/PDFs and LLMs. Supports 80+ languages.
readme_summary: PaddleOCR is a production-ready OCR and document AI engine that converts documents and images into structured, AI-friendly data like JSON and Markdown. It supports over 80 languages and offers end-to-end solutions for text extraction and intelligent document understanding, making it suitable for various AI applications.
key_features: PP-OCRv5 for universal scene text recognition
End-to-end solutions from text extraction to document understanding
primary_use_case: Converting documents and images into structured data for AI applications.
cover_image_prompt: An archaeologist in a brightly lit tent, carefully brushing sand off an ancient stone tablet covered in various scripts. As they brush, the scripts magically transform into neatly organized digital text on a holographic screen beside them. The screen displays JSON and Markdown outputs. Subtle UI elements and code snippets float around the scene. The tent is filled with tools and artifacts. The composition is focused and clean, using a warm color scheme. The image should be in a detailed digital painting style with clear outlines and a sense of discovery.

name: brush
readme_summary: Brush is a 3D reconstruction engine leveraging Gaussian splatting, designed for broad compatibility across macOS, Windows, Linux, Android, and web browsers. It utilizes WebGPU and the Burn machine learning framework to enable real-time rendering and interactive training on diverse platforms, producing dependency-free binaries.
key_features: Training with COLMAP and Nerfstudio data
Interactive training with live scene interaction
Animation support via .zip and delta frame .ply files
primary_use_case: 3D reconstruction and rendering using Gaussian splatting across multiple platforms.
cover_image_prompt: An artist sculpting a 3D landscape from scattered digital particles, using a brush that emits glowing Gaussian splats. The landscape morphs from raw data points into a detailed, vibrant scene. A small UI element displays real-time rendering progress and training metrics. The artist's workspace is filled with subtle tech elements like code snippets and data visualizations. The repository name, 'Brush,' is subtly etched into the handle of the brush. The scene is brightly lit and set in a modern studio. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: X-Gif-Maker
description: Quickly generate gifs from your videos for X (twitter)
readme_summary: X-Gif-Maker is a C++ tool for quickly converting videos into GIFs, optimized for sharing on platforms like X (Twitter). It provides a user-friendly interface with options to adjust GIF quality and width, utilizes multithreading for performance, and includes shortcut keys for efficient operation.
key_features: Drag and drop video to GIF conversion
primary_use_case: Creating GIFs from video files for social media sharing, particularly on X (Twitter).
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled artisan meticulously crafting a mosaic from video reels, each piece fitting perfectly to form a vibrant, animated GIF. The artisan uses specialized tools to carefully cut and arrange the video segments, adjusting the colors and speed to achieve the desired effect. A digital screen displays the final GIF, ready to be shared. The workshop is filled with glowing particles representing data streams, and the repository name is subtly etched onto a tool. The scene is bathed in warm, inviting light. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and a harmonious color palette.

name: Iosevka
description: Versatile typeface for code, from code.
readme_summary: Iosevka is an open-source typeface family designed for coding, terminal use, and technical documentation. It offers both sans-serif and slab-serif styles, available in monospace and quasi-proportional variants, catering to diverse preferences and use cases.
key_features: Installation via GitHub Releases and package managers
OpenType features and ligatures (implied by 'programming-ligatures' topic)
primary_use_case: Writing code, using in terminals, and preparing technical documents.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled calligrapher meticulously crafting letters on a digital drafting table, each character glowing with subtle code-like patterns. The letters seamlessly transition into clean, readable text on nearby screens, showcasing the font's versatility for both code and documents. The drafting table is surrounded by shelves filled with books and coding manuals, subtly hinting at the font's intended use. Small UI elements display font metrics and kerning adjustments. The scene is bathed in soft, diffused light, creating a focused and professional atmosphere. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with a clean, modern aesthetic.

name: airunner
description: Offline inference engine for art, real-time voice conversations, LLM powered chatbots and automated workflows
readme_summary: Airunner is a self-hosted, offline inference engine designed for various AI applications. It supports real-time voice conversations, LLM-powered chatbots, automated workflows, and AI art generation, emphasizing privacy and local processing.
key_features: Real-time conversations with multiple speech engines and auto language detection
Customizable AI Agents with RAG for personalized interactions
Enhanced Knowledge Retrieval using local data
Image Generation & Manipulation with Stable Diffusion and various tools
Multi-lingual Capabilities for TTS, STT, and GUI
Privacy and Security through local operation and customizable guardrails
Performance & Utility with GPU acceleration, theming, and extension API
primary_use_case: Offline AI inference for art generation, voice conversations, chatbots, and automated workflows with a focus on privacy.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan in a cozy workshop, crafting a digital golem from raw data streams. The artisan uses various tools, including a voice synthesizer, a text prompt interface, and an image editor, to shape the golem's personality and abilities. The golem stands animated, ready to assist. Small screens display code snippets and AI parameters. The workshop is filled with glowing particles representing data and creativity. The scene is set in a warmly lit, organized studio. The composition is focused and inviting with a balanced color scheme. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: git-bug
description: Distributed, offline-first bug tracker embedded in git
readme_summary: git-bug is a distributed, offline-first issue management tool embedded directly within a git repository. It allows users to manage issues, comments, and other related data as git objects, enabling decentralized collaboration and offline access to issue tracking information.
primary_use_case: Decentralized, offline-first issue tracking integrated into git repositories.
cover_image_prompt: A cartographer meticulously drawing a map of a vast, uncharted territory, using a compass that resembles the Git logo. The territory represents a software project, and the map symbolizes the issue tracker, with pins marking bugs and features. The cartographer's desk is surrounded by stacks of Git books and glowing screens displaying code snippets. Digital threads connect the pins on the map, forming a network of issues. The scene is set in a cozy, well-lit study with a vintage aesthetic. The image should be in a detailed digital painting style with warm colors and a sense of adventure.
